ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Greeting to all
ygData.msgSnippet: lol, all 3 of us confused each other. PsyKo wrote:/cackle Melefante /point Melefante /laugh Melefante Bar as in barbarian, unless, that is, you we being
ygData.messageBody:
lol, all 3 of us confused each other.
PsyKo wrote:/cackle Melefante
/point Melefante
/laugh Melefante

Bar as in barbarian, unless, that is, you we being
facetious... =P


--- Meleficent Ouverts <meleficent22@...> wrote:
>
> you are running a bar Ralph? How did you do that? I
> am very interested in this.
> thanks
> Melefante 16/ranger/tribunal server
> "(Ralph) Clay" wrote:I am a little new to Everquest
> but I love the game. I am , right now
> running a Shaman Bar. 11th level by the name of
> Fireefrost on the Xev
> server. RIght now I am trying to rid the world of
> Sick Bear and Wolf
> ( and getting the PP and exp's for turning in the
> belts). I am slowly
> riseing in levels but enjoying every sec. of it .
> hope to talk to you
> all later.
>
> Fireefrost
> Healer for the lands of Ice
>
